channel.title: Makehuman on OpenDS Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Makehuman on OpenDS Documentation

item.title: How to create a human model
item.description: Open Makehuman application Adjust the Macros to the required human model in the tab Modelling. Where, Gender, Age, Muscle, Weight, Height, Proportions, Skin shade, Ethnicity can be manipulated in the form of percentage. The result of the changes can be seen in the human model instantly. The values of the model created i.e gender, age, weight etc can be seen in the bottom left part of make human.
